channel.title: Any simple php with mysql intergration tutorials?
channel.description:
Okay don't laugh at this but I'm scared that when I do a large tutorial I might fuck up and be like "oof!", so I'm looking for a simple tutorial with php & mysql intergration.
Please dont let it be a hard one, and I did use google but I cant seem to find any small tutorials! All them is big tutorials, wtf... Like seriously if I do fuck up I wont know wut to do lol...

item.title: Any simple php with mysql intergration tutorials?

item.description:
@ric914 wrote:

www.tizag.com
www.w3schools.com
